rukus.text: What, are you more difficult to create or the heaven? God has constructed it
And on high has He raised its canopy, and He has given it order and perfection
Its night does He endow with darkness, and its splendor does He bring out
And the earth, moreover, has He extended
He draws out from there its moisture and its pasture
And the mountains has He firmly fixed
For use and convenience for you and your livestock
Therefore, when there comes the great overwhelming event
The day when humanity will remember all that they strove for
And hellfire will be placed in full view, for all to see
Then for those who transgressed all bounds
And had preferred the life of the present
The abode will be hellfire
And for those who had entertained the fear of standing before their Lord, and have restrained their soul from lower desires
Their abode will be the garden
They ask you about the Hour, “When will its appointed time be?”
Are you concerned with the declaration of it
With your Lord is the finale
You are only a warner for those who fear it
The day they see it, it will be as if they had stayed but a single evening, or until the following morn
